name: Momoe Link
description:
Momoe is an active and sweet pink cybergirl who loves to sing. She has many friends, great career...

But for now, she decided to take a break and visit her friends. There are Jambu, Shade, and... Candy.
But wait! The real reason behind all that is... a love confession from somebody?!?!

Oh yeah, this game is *cough* gay.

~

Features

  • Quite short playtime, can be completed in one sitting
  • Custom, cute pixelated graphics
  • Yaoi and yuri ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
  • Gameboy-like palette (only 5 colors in total! And it's all PINK)
  • Two endings

Oh, and this game was made for rpgmakernet's event GAYmak the Rainbow~ So, it has to be gay ~- w-)~ Oh, and fun fact: This game is created in 4 days or so. - w-

~

Special Thanks!!

  • rpgmaker.net + event GAYmaker *rainbow*
  • Ivan Mulia
  • Dyari > proofread + correction
  • Ricchan > just because
